title: Effective Teacher-Student Communication Strategies in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Communication competency enhancement through reflective review and technology-based learning tools in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between characteristics of various digital communication channels (synchronous/asynchronous, formal/informal) and select them appropriately for specific contexts.
Learners can assess their communication methods and develop improvement plans through reflective journaling.
Learners can perform effective collaboration in PBL team projects using mobile-based tools (e.g., Google Classroom, Discord).

resources: Free Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
